column5: I'm working at a lodge up here at Wabatong. The eyes are still hanging around the shallower bays with outflowing rivers/creeks. Sub 8 FOW is the ticket right now and were doing very well rip jigging rocky points and shorelines and trolling rapala floating minnows and bombers...pics to follow.
Thanks for posting the report for Wabatong. Any significant weeds yet? Look forward to pics.
